description.narrative: Improved the knowledge and skills of parents and community leaders at priority municipalities on the key nutritional interventions for children to prevent and reduce the malnutrition.

sector.narrative: Breastfeeding protection, promotion and support (including work on Code)
Data, research, evaluation, evidence generation, synthesis, and use for prevention of stunting and other forms of malnutrition
Diet diversity in early childhood (children under 5), includes complementary feeding and MNPs
Hygiene - handwashing with soap in communities
Technical assistance - Maternal and newborn health

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Improved the knowledge and skills of parents and community leaders at priority municipalities on the key nutritional interventions for children to prevent and reduce the malnutrition.

title.narrative: % of children under 5 who suffer chronic malnutrition in 166 municipalities
